## Welcome

This site documents a **reproducible, AI-assisted workflow** for public health data analysis.

### What this site covers

-   Data cleaning and validation
-   AI-assisted code generation
-   Variable labelling and reference categories
-   Exporting data for R, SPSS, and Stata
